content: http://www.fhir.org/guides/argonaut/scheduling/ConceptMap-visit-snomed-map.html (just one example) has a link to http://snomed.info/sct, which doesn't resolve. There was some discussion before about setting that up to resolve.... is that likely to go somwhere?
@Peter Williams Maybe that's something that we can discuss next week at the business meeting in London?
@Rob Hausam Yes, we can surely display something more useful than a 404. I'll add to the agenda.
